column1: GOOOOAAAALLLL!!!! Estupinan makes the most of his opportunity
column2: firing a low shot from the edge of the box that the keeper parries
column3: but Valencia is there to make sure it counts this time
column4: equalizing the score at 1-1. After being denied a goal at the end of the first half
column5: Ake plays Valencia onside and they get the goal they deserve to start the second!
